events.name: Workforce Analytics
events.description: Join this session to learn how you could apply HR data to solve the twin challenge of talent acquisition and retention. Sid and Aaron from Mercer will share their experience in using workforce analytics to help a Singaporean life sciences company. They used simple cluster analyses and open source data to identify rich talent pools for hiring and applied machine learning to predict attrition two months in advance of the actual event. 18:30 - 19:00: Networking19:00 - 20:00: Presentation20:00 - 20:30: Networking
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard

events.name: TechLadies Study CS50 - Week 0 to 3 AGAIN
events.description:
Join us in this women-only study group to learn computer science! While there will be one or two mentors to answer any technical questions you have, you need to be self-reliant as much as possible as this is not a workshop. 

In this study group, we are taking the course, HarvardX: CS50 Introduction to Computer Science, on edX together. As long as you are taking this course, please join us even if you're just getting started! üë©üèª‚Äçüíª üí™

To join in this study group, please:

1. Create an account on edX and enroll into the course at this link: https://courses.edx.org/courses/course-v1:HarvardX+CS50+X/info

2. Start from Week 0 or continue where you've left off. As the free wifi we are tapping on at the cafes might sometimes not be that great, do watch the lecture videos before you come. 

Bring your fully charged laptop and we'll see you soon!

Note: Please buy something at the cafe as we're merely crashing that cafe. We don't want to be kicked out! We're trying out different cafes in search for the most ideal place (spacious, good wifi, convenient location). Until the search is over, do be prepared to tether from your phone when we meet.

Psst! This study group is for women only. :)
events.location: The Daily Roundup, 1 Keong Saik Road #01-02, Singapore 089109

events.name: AsiaVR Tech Talks: 3d modeling series
events.description:
ARTivity ¬†meetup, together with AsiaVR as the is organising a AsiaVR 3d modeling meetup! We are inviting aspiring 3d modeler, freelance/professional 3d modeler, or freelance/professional 3d modeler for VR/AR to come and learn from 3d modeler experts about the technical side on 3d modeling to tune up your skills and equip yourself with valuable knowledge. Best of all, it‚Äôs free like all AsiaVR events! So sign up now! Limited slots available! Tentative Agenda (will still be updated): 7.00pm ~ 7.30pm ¬†The Future is Wild ¬†- Modeling & VR production by Cornel Hillmann, studio.cgartist.com 7.30pm ~ 8.00pm ¬†Sculpting a VR Kaiju by Aaron Lin, Kaiju Den Pte Ltd Follow us on Facebook - AsiaVR:¬†https://www.facebook.com/groups/asiavr/ 

About PIXEL Studios PIXEL Studios is an initiative by IMDA for next generation content creators and media businesses, to come together to conceptualise stories and online videos, develop games, create prototypes and innovate. It aims to build an ecosystem of new media content creators through the provision of shared production facilities, industry-led capability development and accelerator/incubator programmes, to nurture home grown digital media content creators. It is a place where media content creators can network and collaborate to experiment and deliver innovative, compelling content. Follow us on Facebook:¬†https://www.facebook.com/IMPIXELgamer/¬†https://www.facebook.com/IMPIXELcreator/
events.location: PIXEL Studios (Level 2), 10, central green exchange, Singapore
